name: ApwideGoliveSendReleaseInfos{{tag}}
description: Create and update Jira version/release when a Golive application is built/released.
author: apwide
helpMarkDown: Learn more about Apwide Golive integration with Azure DevOps [here](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Apwide.ApwideGoliveForJira{{tag}})

inputs.name: serviceConnection
inputs.label: Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Apwide Golive for Jira connection to use. If needed, select 'Project settings', and create a new 'Service Connection' of type 'Apwide Golive for Jira'.

inputs.name: applicationName
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type the name of the released application.

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the id of the released application.

inputs.name: versionName
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the current Jira version/release

inputs.name: versionDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the current Jira version/release.

inputs.name: versionReleased
inputs.label: Released
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark the current Jira version as released.

inputs.name: issueKeys
inputs.label: Jira Issue Keys
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of Issue Keys to add to the current Jira version/release. Ex: ECOM-3412,ECOM-6783,PAY-98

inputs.name: issueKeysFromCommitHistory
inputs.label: Extract Jira Issue Keys from commits
inputs.helpMarkDown: Parse and retrieve the Jira issue keys found in commit history and add issues to the current Jira version/release.

inputs.name: issuesFromJql
inputs.label: Jira Issues from JQL
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Set the JQL query used to retrieve and add issues to the current Jira version/release. 
Ex: project = ECP AND type in (Story, Bug) AND resolution in (Fixed).
More about JQL [here](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/jql)

inputs.name: sendJiraNotification
inputs.label: Send Jira Notifications
inputs.helpMarkDown: Trigger the standard Jira notification when issues are added to the current Jira version/release.
